desc: Breathe new life into your home. Our goal is to turn your home into your passion and spark your creativity with DIY Workshops. Shop our wide selection of hardware, Canadian handbags & jewelry, kitchenware, DIY needs, Annie Sloan Chalk Paint™, Iron Orchid Designs, and gift items. Located in Perth, Ontario.

layout.text: Turn Your Home Into Your Passion
Discover pieces with character, style, and history along with modern decor, fashion, and accessories.
